text: Pervomaysky () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Pervomaysky Selsoviet, Salavatsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 395 as of 2010. There are 11 streets. == Geography == It is located 68 km from Maloyaz. == References == Category:Rural localities in Salavatsky District
title: Pervomaysky, Salavatsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
